name: Scattered (FoorFootStudios)
description:
Download the game for the best experience. If you decide to play on your browser, use hardware acceleration on your web browser for a smoother experience!

This is a submission for the Dani's Basement Jam game jam. The theme was "You are what you consume"

Description:

An evil robot crushed you! Your body parts are all scattered around! Find all of your body parts and consume them to get them back and fight the final evil robot, who crushed you.

Controls:

W, A, S, D - Move

Left click - Shoot

Use your mouse to aim.
